value.text:
Namaste! Main Lunora, aapka AI study companion hoon. Aapka haal kaisa hai? Kya main aapki koi madad kar sakti hoon?

Aaj kal kya padh rahe hain? Main aapki padhai mein madad kar sakti hoon - maths, science, history, ya phir koi bhi subject!

Agar aapko koi specific topic samajhne mein dikkat ho rahi hai, toh zaroor bataye. Main step-by-step samajhane ki koshish karonge.

Main aapko bhi kuch interesting facts batana chahti hoon:
- Did you know? India has the largest number of post offices in the world - over 1.5 lakh!
- Interesting fact: The game of chess originated in India around the 6th century!

Aapke liye kya kar sakti hoon?
follow_up_questions: Kya aapko koi specific subject mein madad chahiye?
Kya aapko koi interesting fact jaanna hai?
